usage.user_limit_reached_description: You've reached your user limit. Contact support to add more users.
usage.user_capacity_description: Manage your organization's user capacity and monitor available slots.
usage.critical_balance_warning: Critical: AI credits running low. Consider upgrading your plan.
usage.low_balance_warning: Warning: AI credits are getting low.

tier.user_limit_exceeded: Cannot create user: organization has reached the maximum number of users ({{max}}) for the {{tier}} tier.
tier.ai_credits_insufficient: Insufficient AI credits to complete this request. Credits needed: {{required}}, available: {{available}}.
tier.feature_not_available: This feature is not available in your current tier ({{tier}}). Please upgrade to access this functionality.

quickbooks.title: QuickBooks Integration
quickbooks.description: Connect your companies to QuickBooks for real-time financial data
quickbooks.connection_failed: Connection failed. Please check your credentials.
quickbooks.feature_disabled: QuickBooks integration is not enabled for your organization. Contact your administrator.
quickbooks.connection_instructions: Click the button below to connect your company to QuickBooks. You'll be redirected to QuickBooks to authorize access.
quickbooks.disconnect_confirmation: Are you sure you want to disconnect this company from QuickBooks? This will stop automatic data synchronization.
quickbooks.connect_after_creation: Connect this company to QuickBooks after creation

errors.connection_failed: Failed to connect to QuickBooks. Please try again.
errors.disconnection_failed: Failed to disconnect from QuickBooks. Please try again.
errors.sync_failed: Failed to sync data from QuickBooks. Please try again.
errors.invalid_credentials: Invalid QuickBooks credentials. Please check your settings.
errors.feature_not_available: QuickBooks integration is not available for your organization.
errors.already_connected: This company is already connected to QuickBooks.
errors.not_connected: This company is not connected to QuickBooks.
